event.title: appeared at the Harwinton Senior Center Sunday

data.event: HARWINTON — Former Democratic Senate nominee Ned Lamont appeared at the Harwinton Senior Center Sunday to share his thoughts on President Obama’s first two months in office and the current state of Connecticut’s economy.

HARWINTON — Former Democratic Senate nominee Ned Lamont appeared at the Harwinton Senior Center Sunday to share his thoughts on President Obama’s first two months in office and the current state of Connecticut’s economy.

event.title: hotly contested Senate run against Joe Lieberman in 2006

data.event: Speaking to a crowd of around 35 people made up mostly of Harwinton Democratic Town Committee members, Lamont thanked the locals who, he said, supported him so vigorously during his failed but hotly contested Senate run against Joe Lieberman in 2006.
